actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the withdrawal of all American forces from Vietnam.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of Congress that a complete withdrawal of all American forces from Vietnam should be accomplished within four months after the establishment of an internationally supervised cease-fire throughout Indochina; and the safe return of all American prisoners of war and an accounting of all Americans missing in action as a result of the present conflict in Southeast Asia.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the withdrawal of all American forces from Vietnam.
